meanings.sent1: I counted to eights on my fingers.
meanings.sent2: The game requires rolling two eights to win.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the stack of eights, creating chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cats is as strong as eights in a math problem.
meanings.sent5: The eights on the scoreboard lit up brightly.

meanings.definition: A playing card with the value of eight.
meanings.sent1: She drew an eights from the deck.
meanings.sent2: In the game, the eights are wild cards.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out an endless stream of eights from his hat.
meanings.sent4: His poker face revealed nothing, even when holding all eights.
meanings.sent5: The eights in the deck seemed to wink at her mischievously.

meanings.sent1: The skater glided gracefully in eights on the ice.
meanings.sent2: The ribbon formed a perfect eights in the air.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased its tail, forming an accidental eights.
meanings.sent4: The wind twisted the clouds into mesmerizing eights.
meanings.sent5: The eights in the sand looked like infinity symbols.

meanings.definition: A group of eight people or things.
meanings.sent1: The eights gathered for a group photo.
meanings.sent2: The team consisted of eights with diverse skills.
meanings.sent3: The eights lined up for the race, each eager to win.
meanings.sent4: The eights worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The eights in the choir sang in perfect harmony.
